# Materials & Methods

This section describes the materials and methods employed during the development of the thesis. More concretely, this section encompasses the follwing subsections:

- @sec-collection_tools: describes the reliable data collection libraries for Android smartphones and Wear OS smartwatches.
- @sec-dataset: describes the smartphone and smartwatch inertial sensors collected database from heterogeneous subjects for HAR applications.
- @sec-common_methods: describes the ML and DL architectures employed for HAR classification and the statistical tools used to determine the significance of the presented results.

::: {.callout-note}
The contents on this section correspond with the Chapter 2 of the dissertation document.
:::
